channel.title: CVE Feed for slui -- Media Hygiene: Remove or Delete Unused Images and More!
channel.description: The latest CVEs for slui -- Media Hygiene: Remove or Delete Unused Images and More!

item.title: CVE-2024-5855|2024-08-01T21:25:02.956Z -- slui -- media%20hygiene%3A%20remove%20or%20delete%20unused%20images%20and%20more%21
item.description: The Media Hygiene: Remove or Delete Unused Images and More! plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the bulk_action_delete and delete_single_image_call AJAX actions in all versions up to, and including, 3.0.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to delete arbitrary attachments. A nonce check was added in version 3.0.1, however, it wasn't until version 3.0.2 that a capability check was added.

item.title: CVE-2024-5855|2024-07-09T02:03:10.458Z -- slui -- media%20hygiene%3A%20remove%20or%20delete%20unused%20images%20and%20more%21

A nonce check was added in version 3.0.1, however, it wasn't until version 3.0.2 that a capability check was added.
